overview:
Andy Macdonald was a member of the founding management team of First Advantage. During his time at First Advantage, he served as President of the Employer Services Group, the largest global provider of pre-employment background and drug screening, the Investigative and Litigation Services Group and the Corporate Development Group. First Advantage (NASDAQ: FADV) sold to First American (NYSE:FAF) in Q4 2009 for approximately $1.1B.

Currently, Macdonald is the President of CoreLogixâ€™s Investigative and Litigation Services, a leader in electronic discovery, and a venture partner at FirstMark, where he will focus on data and information services investments.
